00073 static Mesh *rna_mesh(PointerRNA *ptr)
00074 {
00075     Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ptr->id.data;
00076     return me;
00077 }
00078 
00079 static CustomData *rna_mesh_pdata_helper(Mesh *me)
00080 {
00081     return (me->edit_btmesh) ? &me->edit_btmesh->bm->pdata : &me->pdata;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static CustomData *rna_mesh_ldata_helper(Mesh *me)
00085 {
00086     return (me->edit_btmesh) ? &me->edit_btmesh->bm->ldata : &me->ldata;
00087 }
00088 
00089 static CustomData *rna_mesh_fdata_helper(Mesh *me)
00090 {
00091     return (me->edit_btmesh) ? NULL : &me->fdata;
00092 }
00093 
00094 static CustomData *rna_mesh_pdata(PointerRNA *ptr)
00095 {
00096     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00097     return rna_mesh_pdata_helper(me);
00098 }
00099

00109     return rna_mesh_fdata_helper(me);

00112 static void rna_Mesh_update_data(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00113 {
00114     ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00115 
00116     /* cheating way for importers to avoid slow updates */
00117     if (id->us > 0) {
00118         DAG_id_tag_update(id, 0);
00119         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, id);
00120     }
00121 }
00122 
00123 static void rna_Mesh_update_select(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00124 {
00125     ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00126     /* cheating way for importers to avoid slow updates */
00127     if (id->us > 0) {
00128         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, id);
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 void rna_Mesh_update_draw(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00133 {
00134     ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00135     /* cheating way for importers to avoid slow updates */
00136     if (id->us > 0) {
00137         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, id);
00138     }
00139 }

00142 void rna_Mesh_update_vertmask(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00143 {
00144     Mesh* me = ptr->data;
00145     if ((me->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) && (me->editflag & ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK)) {
00146         me->editflag ^= ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK;
00147     }
00148     rna_Mesh_update_draw(bmain, scene, ptr);
00149 }
00150 
00151 void rna_Mesh_update_facemask(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00152 {
00153     Mesh* me = ptr->data;
00154     if ((me->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) && (me->editflag & ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK)) {
00155         me->editflag ^= ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL;
00156     }
00157     rna_Mesh_update_draw(bmain, scene, ptr);
00158 }
00159 static void rna_MeshVertex_normal_get(PointerRNA *ptr, float *value)
00160 {
00161     MVert *mvert = (MVert*)ptr->data;
00162     normal_short_to_float_v3(value, mvert->no);
00163 }

00165 static void rna_MeshVertex_normal_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const float *value)
00166 {
00167     MVert *mvert = (MVert*)ptr->data;
00168     float no[3];
00169 
00170     copy_v3_v3(no, value);
00171     normalize_v3(no);
00172     normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert->no, no);
00173 }

00228 static void rna_MeshTessFace_normal_get(PointerRNA *ptr, float *values)
00229 {
00230     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00231     MFace *mface = (MFace*)ptr->data;
00232 
00233     if (mface->v4)
00234         normal_quad_v3(values, me->mvert[mface->v1].co, me->mvert[mface->v2].co,
00235                        me->mvert[mface->v3].co, me->mvert[mface->v4].co);
00236     else
00237         normal_tri_v3(values, me->mvert[mface->v1].co, me->mvert[mface->v2].co, me->mvert[mface->v3].co);
00238 }
00239 
00240 static float rna_MeshTessFace_area_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00241 {
00242     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00243     MFace *mface = (MFace*)ptr->data;
00244 
00245     if (mface->v4)
00246         return area_quad_v3(me->mvert[mface->v1].co, me->mvert[mface->v2].co, me->mvert[mface->v3].co,
00247                             me->mvert[mface->v4].co);
00248     else
00249         return area_tri_v3(me->mvert[mface->v1].co, me->mvert[mface->v2].co, me->mvert[mface->v3].co);
00250 }

00316 static int rna_CustomDataData_numverts(PointerRNA *ptr, int type)
00317 {
00318     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00319     CustomData *fdata = rna_mesh_fdata(ptr);
00320     CustomDataLayer *cdl;
00321     int a, b;
00322 
00323     for (cdl = fdata->layers, a = 0; a < fdata->totlayer; cdl++, a++) {
00324         if (cdl->type == type) {
00325             b = ((char *)ptr->data - ((char*)cdl->data)) / CustomData_sizeof(type);
00326             if (b >= 0 && b < me->totface) {
00327                 return (me->mface[b].v4 ? 4 : 3);
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332     return 0;
00333 }
00334 
00335 static int rna_MeshTextureFace_uv_get_length(PointerRNA *ptr, int length[RNA_MAX_ARRAY_DIMENSION])
00336 {
00337     length[0] = rna_CustomDataData_numverts(ptr, CD_MTFACE);
00338     length[1] = 2;
00339     return length[0]*length[1];
00340 }
00341 
00342 static void rna_MeshTextureFace_uv_get(PointerRNA *ptr, float *values)
00343 {
00344     MTFace *mtface = (MTFace*)ptr->data;
00345     int totvert = rna_CustomDataData_numverts(ptr, CD_MTFACE);
00346 
00347     memcpy(values, mtface->uv, totvert * 2 * sizeof(float));
00348 }
00349 
00350 static void rna_MeshTextureFace_uv_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const float *values)
00351 {
00352     MTFace *mtface = (MTFace*)ptr->data;
00353     int totvert = rna_CustomDataData_numverts(ptr, CD_MTFACE);
00354 
00355     memcpy(mtface->uv, values, totvert * 2 * sizeof(float));
00356 }

00359 static void rna_MeshColor_color1_get(PointerRNA *ptr, float *values)
00360 {
00361     MCol *mcol = (MCol*)ptr->data;
00362 
00363     values[2] = (&mcol[0].r)[0]/255.0f;
00364     values[1] = (&mcol[0].r)[1]/255.0f;
00365     values[0] = (&mcol[0].r)[2]/255.0f;
00366 }
00367 
00368 static void rna_MeshColor_color1_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const float *values)
00369 {
00370     MCol *mcol = (MCol*)ptr->data;
00371 
00372     (&mcol[0].r)[2] = (char)(CLAMPIS(values[0]*255.0f, 0, 255));
00373     (&mcol[0].r)[1] = (char)(CLAMPIS(values[1]*255.0f, 0, 255));
00374     (&mcol[0].r)[0] = (char)(CLAMPIS(values[2]*255.0f, 0, 255));
00375 }

00449 static int rna_Mesh_texspace_editable(PointerRNA *ptr)

00452     return (me->texflag & ME_AUTOSPACE)? 0: PROP_EDITABLE;

00455 static void rna_MeshVertex_groups_begin(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter, PointerRNA *ptr)
00456 {
00457     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00458 
00459     if (me->dvert) {
00460         MVert *mvert = (MVert*)ptr->data;
00461         MDeformVert *dvert = me->dvert + (mvert-me->mvert);
00462 
00463         rna_iterator_array_begin(iter, (void*)dvert->dw, sizeof(MDeformWeight), dvert->totweight, 0, NULL);
00464     }
00465     else
00466         rna_iterator_array_begin(iter, NULL, 0, 0, 0, NULL);
00467 }

00469 static int rna_CustomDataLayer_active_get(PointerRNA *ptr, CustomData *data, int type, int render)
00470 {
00471     int n = ((CustomDataLayer*)ptr->data) - data->layers;
00472 
00473     if (render) return (n == CustomData_get_render_layer_index(data, type));
00474     else return (n == CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, type));
00475 }
00476 
00477 static int rna_CustomDataLayer_clone_get(PointerRNA *ptr, CustomData *data, int type, int render)
00478 {
00479     int n = ((CustomDataLayer*)ptr->data) - data->layers;
00480 
00481     return (n == CustomData_get_clone_layer_index(data, type));
00482 }
00483 
00484 static void rna_CustomDataLayer_active_set(PointerRNA *ptr, CustomData *data, int value, int type, int render)
00485 {
00486     int n = (((CustomDataLayer*)ptr->data) - data->layers) - CustomData_get_layer_index(data, type);
00487 
00488     if (value == 0)
00489         return;
00490 
00491     if (render) CustomData_set_layer_render(data, type, n);
00492     else        CustomData_set_layer_active(data, type, n);
00493 
00494     /* sync loop layer */
00495     if (type == CD_MTEXPOLY) {
00496         CustomData *ldata = rna_mesh_ldata(ptr);
00497         if (render) CustomData_set_layer_render(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, n);
00498         else        CustomData_set_layer_active(ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, n);
00499     }
00500 }
00501 
00502 static void rna_CustomDataLayer_clone_set(PointerRNA *ptr, CustomData *data, int value, int type, int render)
00503 {
00504     int n = ((CustomDataLayer*)ptr->data) - data->layers;
00505 
00506     if (value == 0)
00507         return;
00508 
00509     CustomData_set_layer_clone_index(data, type, n);
00510 }

00835 
00836 static void rna_TexturePoly_image_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00837 {
00838     MTexPoly *tf = (MTexPoly*)ptr->data;
00839     ID *id = value.data;
00840 
00841     if (id) {
00842         /* special exception here, individual faces don't count
00843          * as reference, but we do ensure the refcount is not zero */
00844         if (id->us == 0)
00845             id_us_plus(id);
00846         else
00847             id_lib_extern(id);
00848     }
00849 
00850     tf->tpage = (struct Image *)id;
00851 }
00852 
00853 /* while this is supposed to be readonly,
00854  * keep it to support importers that only make tessfaces */
00855 static void rna_TextureFace_image_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00856 {
00857     MTFace *tf = (MTFace*)ptr->data;
00858     ID *id = value.data;
00859 
00860     if (id) {
00861         /* special exception here, individual faces don't count
00862          * as reference, but we do ensure the refcount is not zero */
00863         if (id->us == 0)
00864             id_us_plus(id);
00865         else
00866             id_lib_extern(id);
00867     }
00868 
00869     tf->tpage = (struct Image *)id;
00870 }
00871 
00872 static void rna_Mesh_auto_smooth_angle_set(PointerRNA *ptr, float value)
00873 {
00874     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00875     value = RAD2DEGF(value);
00876     CLAMP(value, 1.0f, 80.0f);
00877     me->smoothresh = (int)value;
00878 }
00879 
00880 static float rna_Mesh_auto_smooth_angle_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00881 {
00882     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00883     return DEG2RADF((float)me->smoothresh);
00884 }
00885 
00886 static int rna_MeshTessFace_verts_get_length(PointerRNA *ptr, int length[RNA_MAX_ARRAY_DIMENSION])
00887 {
00888     MFace *face = (MFace*)ptr->data;
00889 
00890     if (face)
00891         length[0] = (face->v4)? 4: 3;
00892     else
00893         length[0] = 4; /* XXX rna_raw_access wants the length of a dummy face. this needs fixing. - Campbell */
00894 
00895     return length[0];
00896 }
00897 
00898 static void rna_MeshTessFace_verts_get(PointerRNA *ptr, int *values)
00899 {
00900     MFace *face = (MFace*)ptr->data;
00901     memcpy(values, &face->v1, (face->v4 ? 4 : 3) * sizeof(int));
00902 }
00903 
00904 static void rna_MeshTessFace_verts_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const int *values)
00905 {
00906     MFace *face = (MFace*)ptr->data;
00907     memcpy(&face->v1, values, (face->v4 ? 4 : 3) * sizeof(int));
00908 }
00909 
00910 /* poly.vertices - this is faked loop access for convenience */
00911 static int rna_MeshPoly_vertices_get_length(PointerRNA *ptr, int length[RNA_MAX_ARRAY_DIMENSION])
00912 {
00913     MPoly *mp = (MPoly*)ptr->data;
00914     /* note, raw access uses dummy item, this _could_ crash, watch out for this, mface uses it but it cant work here */
00915     return (length[0] = mp->totloop);
00916 }
00917 
00918 static void rna_MeshPoly_vertices_get(PointerRNA *ptr, int *values)
00919 {
00920     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00921     MPoly *mp = (MPoly*)ptr->data;
00922     MLoop *ml = &me->mloop[mp->loopstart];
00923     unsigned int i;
00924     for (i = mp->totloop; i > 0; i--, values++, ml++) {
00925         *values = ml->v;
00926     }
00927 }
00928 
00929 static void rna_MeshPoly_vertices_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const int *values)
00930 {
00931     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00932     MPoly *mp = (MPoly*)ptr->data;
00933     MLoop *ml = &me->mloop[mp->loopstart];
00934     unsigned int i;
00935     for (i = mp->totloop; i > 0; i--, values++, ml++) {
00936         ml->v = *values;
00937     }
00938 }
00939 
00940 static void rna_MeshPoly_material_index_range(PointerRNA *ptr, int *min, int *max, int *softmin, int *softmax)
00941 {
00942     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
00943     *min = 0;
00944     *max = me->totcol-1;
00945     *max = MAX2(0, *max);
00946 }

00982 
00983 /* path construction */
00984 
00985 static char *rna_VertexGroupElement_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00986 {
00987     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr); /* XXX not always! */
00988     MDeformWeight *dw = (MDeformWeight*)ptr->data;
00989     MDeformVert *dvert;
00990     int a, b;
00991 
00992     for (a = 0, dvert = me->dvert; a < me->totvert; a++, dvert++)
00993         for (b = 0; b < dvert->totweight; b++)
00994             if (dw == &dvert->dw[b])
00995                 return BLI_sprintfN("verts[%d].groups[%d]", a, b);
00996 
00997     return NULL;
00998 }
00999 
01000 static char *rna_MeshPolygon_path(PointerRNA *ptr)

01002     return BLI_sprintfN("polygons[%d]", (int)((MPoly*)ptr->data - rna_mesh(ptr)->mpoly));
01003 }

01035 
01036 static char *rna_PolyCustomData_data_path(PointerRNA *ptr, char *collection, int type)
01037 {
01038     CustomDataLayer *cdl;
01039     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
01040     CustomData *pdata = rna_mesh_pdata(ptr);
01041     int a, b, totpoly = (me->edit_btmesh) ? 0 : me->totpoly;
01042 
01043     for (cdl = pdata->layers, a = 0; a < pdata->totlayer; cdl++, a++) {
01044         if (cdl->type == type) {
01045             b = ((char*)ptr->data - ((char*)cdl->data))/CustomData_sizeof(type);
01046             if (b >= 0 && b < totpoly)
01047                 return BLI_sprintfN("%s[\"%s\"].data[%d]", collection, cdl->name, b);
01048         }
01049     }
01050 
01051     return NULL;
01052 }
01053 
01054 static char *rna_LoopCustomData_data_path(PointerRNA *ptr, char *collection, int type)
01055 {
01056     CustomDataLayer *cdl;
01057     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
01058     CustomData *ldata = rna_mesh_ldata(ptr);
01059     int a, b, totloop = (me->edit_btmesh) ? 0 : me->totloop;
01060 
01061     for (cdl = ldata->layers, a = 0; a < ldata->totlayer; cdl++, a++) {
01062         if (cdl->type == type) {
01063             b = ((char*)ptr->data - ((char*)cdl->data))/CustomData_sizeof(type);
01064             if (b >= 0 && b < totloop)
01065                 return BLI_sprintfN("%s[\"%s\"].data[%d]", collection, cdl->name, b);
01066         }
01067     }
01068 
01069     return NULL;
01070 }
01071 
01072 static char *rna_FaceCustomData_data_path(PointerRNA *ptr, char *collection, int type)
01073 {
01074     CustomDataLayer *cdl;
01075     Mesh *me = rna_mesh(ptr);
01076     CustomData *fdata = rna_mesh_fdata(ptr);
01077     int a, b, totloop = (me->edit_btmesh) ? 0 : me->totloop;
01078 
01079     for (cdl = fdata->layers, a = 0; a < fdata->totlayer; cdl++, a++) {
01080         if (cdl->type == type) {
01081             b = ((char*)ptr->data - ((char*)cdl->data))/CustomData_sizeof(type);
01082             if (b >= 0 && b < totloop)
01083                 return BLI_sprintfN("%s[\"%s\"].data[%d]", collection, cdl->name, b);
01084         }
01085     }
01086 
01087     return NULL;
01088 }

01156 {

01159 }
01160 static int rna_Mesh_tot_edge_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
01161 {

01163     return me->edit_btmesh ? me->edit_btmesh->bm->totedgesel: 0;
01164 }
01165 static int rna_Mesh_tot_face_get(PointerRNA *ptr)

01170 
01171 static PointerRNA rna_Mesh_vertex_color_new(struct Mesh *me, struct bContext *C, const char *name)
01172 {
01173     PointerRNA ptr;
01174     CustomData *ldata;
01175     CustomDataLayer *cdl = NULL;
01176     int index = ED_mesh_color_add(C, NULL, NULL, me, name, FALSE);
01177 
01178     if (index != -1) {
01179         ldata = rna_mesh_ldata_helper(me);
01180         cdl = &ldata->layers[CustomData_get_layer_index_n(ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL, index)];
01181     }
01182 
01183     RNA_pointer_create(&me->id, &RNA_MeshLoopColorLayer, cdl, &ptr);
01184     return ptr;
01185 }
01186 
01187 static PointerRNA rna_Mesh_tessface_vertex_color_new(struct Mesh *me, struct bContext *C, ReportList *reports,
01188                                                      const char *name)
01189 {
01190     PointerRNA ptr;
01191     CustomData *fdata;
01192     CustomDataLayer *cdl = NULL;
01193     int index;
01194 
01195     if (me->edit_btmesh) {
01196         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't add tessface colors's in editmode");
01197         return PointerRNA_NULL;
01198     }
01199 
01200     if (me->mpoly) {
01201         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't add tessface colors's when MPoly's exist");
01202         return PointerRNA_NULL;
01203     }
01204 
01205     index = ED_mesh_color_add(C, NULL, NULL, me, name, FALSE);
01206 
01207     if (index != -1) {
01208         fdata = rna_mesh_fdata_helper(me);
01209         cdl = &fdata->layers[CustomData_get_layer_index_n(fdata, CD_MCOL, index)];
01210     }
01211 
01212     RNA_pointer_create(&me->id, &RNA_MeshColorLayer, cdl, &ptr);
01213     return ptr;
01214 }
01215 
01216 static PointerRNA rna_Mesh_polygon_int_property_new(struct Mesh *me, struct bContext *C, const char *name)
01217 {
01218     PointerRNA ptr;
01219     CustomDataLayer *cdl = NULL;
01220     int index;
01221 
01222     CustomData_add_layer_named(&me->pdata, CD_PROP_INT, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, me->totpoly, name);
01223     index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(&me->pdata, CD_PROP_INT, name);
01224 
01225     cdl = (index == -1) ? NULL : &(me->pdata.layers[index]);
01226 
01227     RNA_pointer_create(&me->id, &RNA_MeshIntPropertyLayer, cdl, &ptr);
01228     return ptr;
01229 }

01311 static void rna_def_mvert_group(BlenderRNA *brna)
01312 {
01313     StructRNA *srna;
01314     PropertyRNA *prop;
01315 
01316     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "VertexGroupElement", NULL);
01317     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "MDeformWeight");
01318     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_VertexGroupElement_path");
01319     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Vertex Group Element", "Weight value of a vertex in a vertex group");
01320     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_GROUP_VERTEX);
01321 
01322     /* we can't point to actual group, it is in the object and so
01323      * there is no unique group to point to, hence the index */
01324     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "group", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01325     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "def_nr");
01326     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
01327     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Group Index", "");
01328     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01329 
01330     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "weight", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
01331     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01332     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Weight", "Vertex Weight");
01333     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01334 }
01335 
01336 static void rna_def_mvert(BlenderRNA *brna)
01337 {
01338     StructRNA *srna;
01339     PropertyRNA *prop;
01340 
01341     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "MeshVertex", NULL);
01342     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "MVert");
01343     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Mesh Vertex", "Vertex in a Mesh datablock");
01344     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_MeshVertex_path");
01345     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_VERTEXSEL);
01346 
01347     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "co", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
01348     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Location", "");
01349     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01350 
01351     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "normal", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_DIRECTION);
01352     /* RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "no"); */
01353     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
01354     RNA_def_property_range(prop, -1.0f, 1.0f);
01355     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshVertex_normal_get", "rna_MeshVertex_normal_set", NULL);
01356     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Normal", "Vertex Normal");
01357 
01358     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01359     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", SELECT);
01360     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "");
01361     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_select");
01362 
01363     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "hide", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01364     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", ME_HIDE);
01365     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Hide", "");
01366     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_select");
01367 
01368     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bevel_weight", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
01369     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshVertex_bevel_weight_get", "rna_MeshVertex_bevel_weight_set", NULL);
01370     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bevel Weight", "Weight used by the Bevel modifier 'Only Vertices' option");
01371     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01372 
01373     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "groups", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01374     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshVertex_groups_begin", "rna_iterator_array_next",
01375                                       "rna_iterator_array_end", "rna_iterator_array_get", NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01376     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "VertexGroupElement");
01377     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Groups", "Weights for the vertex groups this vertex is member of");
01378 
01379     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01380     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
01381     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshVertex_index_get", NULL, NULL);
01382     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Index", "Index number of the vertex");
01383 }

01442 static void rna_def_mface(BlenderRNA *brna)

01450     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_MeshTessFace_path");
01451     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_FACESEL);
01452 
01453     /* XXX allows creating invalid meshes */

01455     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 4);

01457     RNA_def_property_dynamic_array_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshTessFace_verts_get_length");
01458     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshTessFace_verts_get", "rna_MeshTessFace_verts_set", NULL);
01459     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Vertices", "Vertex indices");
01460 
01461     /* leaving this fixed size array for foreach_set used in import scripts */
01462     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "vertices_raw", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01463     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "v1");

01466

01469     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Material Index", "");
01470     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_MeshPoly_material_index_range"); /* reuse for tessface is ok */
01471     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01472

01474     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", ME_FACE_SEL);
01475     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "");
01476     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_select");
01477

01479     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", ME_HIDE);
01480     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Hide", "");
01481     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_select");
01482 
01483     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_smooth", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01484     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", ME_SMOOTH);
01485     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Smooth", "");
01486     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01487

01490     RNA_def_property_range(prop, -1.0f, 1.0f);

01531 
01532 static void rna_def_mpolygon(BlenderRNA *brna)
01533 {
01534     StructRNA *srna;
01535     PropertyRNA *prop;
01536 
01537     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "MeshPolygon", NULL);
01538     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "MPoly");
01539     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Mesh Polygon", "Polygon in a Mesh datablock");
01540     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_MeshPolygon_path");
01541     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_FACESEL);
01542 
01543     /* Faked, actually access to loop vertex values, don't this way because manually setting up
01544      * vertex/edge per loop is very low level.
01545      * Instead we setup poly sizes, assign indices, then calc edges automatic when creating
01546      * meshes from rna/py. */
01547     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "vertices", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01548     /* Eek, this is still used in some cases but in fact we don't want to use it at all here. */
01549     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
01550     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_DYNAMIC);
01551     RNA_def_property_dynamic_array_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshPoly_vertices_get_length");
01552     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshPoly_vertices_get", "rna_MeshPoly_vertices_set", NULL);
01553     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Vertices", "Vertex indices");
01554 
01555     /* these are both very low level access */
01556     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "loop_start", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01557     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "loopstart");
01558     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Loop Start", "");
01559     /* also low level */
01560     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "loop_total", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01561     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "totloop");
01562     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Loop Total", "");
01563

01599     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshPolygon_index_get", NULL, NULL);

01933 
01934     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "active_render", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01935     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "active_rnd", 0);
01936     RNA_def_property_boolean_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshLoopColorLayer_active_render_get",
01937                                    "rna_MeshLoopColorLayer_active_render_set");
01938     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Active Render", "Sets the layer as active for rendering");
01939     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01940 
01941     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "data", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01942     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshLoopColor");
01943     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Data", "");
01944     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshLoopColorLayer_data_begin", "rna_iterator_array_next",
01945                                       "rna_iterator_array_end", "rna_iterator_array_get",
01946                                       "rna_MeshLoopColorLayer_data_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);
01947 
01948 
01949     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "MeshLoopColor", NULL);
01950     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "MLoopCol");
01951     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Mesh Vertex Color", "Vertex loop colors in a Mesh");
01952     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_MeshColor_path");
01953 
01954     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "color", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_COLOR);
01955     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
01956     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01957     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_MeshLoopColor_color_get", "rna_MeshLoopColor_color_set", NULL);
01958     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Color", "");
01959     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
01960 }

02056 void rna_def_texmat_common(StructRNA *srna, const char *texspace_editable)
02057 {
02058     PropertyRNA *prop;
02059 
02060     /* texture space */
02061     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "auto_texspace", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
02062     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "texflag", ME_AUTOSPACE);
02063     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Auto Texture Space",
02064                              "Adjust active object's texture space automatically when transforming object");
02065 
02066     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texspace_location", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
02067     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "loc");
02068     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texure Space Location", "Texture space location");
02069     RNA_def_property_editable_func(prop, texspace_editable);
02070     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_draw");
02071 
02072     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texspace_size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_XYZ);
02073     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "size");
02074     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Space Size", "Texture space size");
02075     RNA_def_property_editable_func(prop, texspace_editable);
02076     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_draw");
02077 
02078     /* not supported yet
02079     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texspace_rot", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_EULER);
02080     RNA_def_property_float(prop, NULL, "rot");
02081     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Space Rotation", "Texture space rotation");
02082     RNA_def_property_editable_func(prop, texspace_editable);
02083     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_draw");*/
02084 
02085     /* materials */
02086     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "materials", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02087     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "mat", "totcol");
02088     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Material");
02089     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Materials", "");
02090     RNA_def_property_srna(prop, "IDMaterials"); /* see rna_ID.c */
02091     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, "rna_IDMaterials_assign_int");
02092 }

02361     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_CONTEXT);
02362     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Add a float property layer to Mesh");
02363     RNA_def_string(func, "name", "Float Prop", 0, "", "Float property name");
02364     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "layer", "MeshFloatPropertyLayer", "", "The newly created layer");
02365     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_RNAPTR);
02366     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
02367 }

02424                                "rna_Mesh_tessface_uv_texture_active_index_set", "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_index_range");

02426     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
02427 }

02448     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_RNAPTR);
02449     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
02450 
02451 /*
02452     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "remove", "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_layers_remove");
02453     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Remove a vertex color layer");
02454     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);

02468                                "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_active_index_set", "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_index_range");
02469     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Active UV Map Index", "Active UV Map index");
02470     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_data");
02471 }
02472 
02473 static void rna_def_mesh(BlenderRNA *brna)
02474 {
02475     StructRNA *srna;
02476     PropertyRNA *prop;
02477 
02478     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Mesh", "ID");
02479     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Mesh", "Mesh datablock defining geometric surfaces");
02480     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_MESH_DATA);
02481 
02482     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "vertices", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02483     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "mvert", "totvert");
02484     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshVertex");
02485     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Vertices", "Vertices of the mesh");
02486     rna_def_mesh_vertices(brna, prop);
02487 
02488     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "edges", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02489     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "medge", "totedge");
02490     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshEdge");
02491     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Edges", "Edges of the mesh");
02492     rna_def_mesh_edges(brna, prop);
02493 
02494     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tessfaces", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02495     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "mface", "totface");
02496     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshTessFace");
02497     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "TessFaces", "Tessellation faces of the mesh (derived from polygons)");
02498     rna_def_mesh_tessfaces(brna, prop);
02499 
02500     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "loops", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02501     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "mloop", "totloop");
02502     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshLoop");
02503     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Loops", "Loops of the mesh (polygon corners)");
02504     rna_def_mesh_loops(brna, prop);
02505 
02506     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "polygons", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02507     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "mpoly", "totpoly");
02508     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshPolygon");
02509     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Polygons", "Polygons of the mesh");
02510     rna_def_mesh_polygons(brna, prop);
02511 
02512     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "sticky", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02513     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "msticky", "totvert");
02514     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshSticky");
02515     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Sticky", "Sticky texture coordinates");
02516 
02517     /* TODO, should this be allowed to be its self? */
02518     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texture_mesh", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
02519     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "texcomesh");
02520     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE|PROP_ID_SELF_CHECK);
02521     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Mesh",
02522                              "Use another mesh for texture indices (vertex indices must be aligned)");
02523 
02524     /* UV loop layers */
02525     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_layers", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02526     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "ldata.layers", "ldata.totlayer");
02527     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_layers_begin", NULL, NULL, NULL,
02528                                       "rna_Mesh_uv_layers_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);
02529     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshUVLoopLayer");
02530     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "UV Loop Layers", "All UV loop layers");
02531     rna_def_uv_layers(brna, prop);
02532 
02533     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_layer_clone", PROP_POINTER, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02534     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshUVLoopLayer");
02535     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_clone_get",
02536                                    "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_clone_set", NULL, NULL);
02537     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
02538     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Clone UV loop layer", "UV loop layer to be used as cloning source");
02539 
02540     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_layer_clone_index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02541     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_clone_index_get",
02542                                "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_clone_index_set", "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_index_range");
02543     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Clone UV loop layer Index", "Clone UV loop layer index");
02544 
02545     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_layer_stencil", PROP_POINTER, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02546     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshUVLoopLayer");
02547     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_stencil_get",
02548                                    "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_stencil_set", NULL, NULL);
02549     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
02550     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mask UV loop layer", "UV loop layer to mask the painted area");
02551 
02552     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_layer_stencil_index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02553     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_stencil_index_get",
02554                                "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_stencil_index_set", "rna_Mesh_uv_layer_index_range");
02555     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mask UV loop layer Index", "Mask UV loop layer index");
02556 
02557     /* Tessellated face UV maps - used by renderers */
02558     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tessface_uv_textures", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02559     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "fdata.layers", "fdata.totlayer");
02560     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_tessface_uv_textures_begin", NULL, NULL, NULL,
02561                                       "rna_Mesh_tessface_uv_textures_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);
02562     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshTextureFaceLayer");
02563     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tessellated Face UV Maps",
02564                              "All UV maps for tessellated faces (read-only, for use by renderers)");
02565     rna_def_tessface_uv_textures(brna, prop);
02566 
02567     /* UV maps */
02568     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_textures", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02569     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "pdata.layers", "pdata.totlayer");
02570     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_textures_begin", NULL, NULL, NULL,
02571                                       "rna_Mesh_uv_textures_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);
02572     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshTexturePolyLayer");
02573     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "UV Maps", "All UV maps");
02574     rna_def_uv_textures(brna, prop);
02575 
02576     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_texture_clone", PROP_POINTER, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02577     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshTexturePolyLayer");
02578     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_clone_get",
02579                                    "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_clone_set", NULL, NULL);
02580     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
02581     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Clone UV Map", "UV map to be used as cloning source");
02582 
02583     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_texture_clone_index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02584     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_clone_index_get",
02585                                "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_clone_index_set", "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_index_range");
02586     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Clone UV Map Index", "Clone UV map index");
02587 
02588     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_texture_stencil", PROP_POINTER, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02589     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "MeshTexturePolyLayer");
02590     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_stencil_get",
02591                                    "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_stencil_set", NULL, NULL);
02592     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
02593     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mask UV Map", "UV map to mask the painted area");
02594 
02595     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "uv_texture_stencil_index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
02596     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_stencil_index_get",
02597                                "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_stencil_index_set", "rna_Mesh_uv_texture_index_range");
02598     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mask UV Map Index", "Mask UV map index");
02599 
02600     /* Tessellated face colors - used by renderers */
02601 
02602     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tessface_vertex_colors", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
02603     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "fdata.layers", "fdata.totlayer");

02605                                       "rna_Mesh_tessface_vertex_colors_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);

02608                              "All tessellated face colors (read-only, for use by renderers)");

02610

02616                                       "rna_Mesh_vertex_colors_length", NULL, NULL, NULL);

02649                              "as 'smooth' during render");

02700

02719     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Mesh_update_draw");

02821     rna_def_animdata_common(srna);
02822     rna_def_texmat_common(srna, "rna_Mesh_texspace_editable");
02823 
02824     RNA_api_mesh(srna);
02825 }
02826 
02827 void RNA_def_mesh(BlenderRNA *brna)
02828 {
02829     rna_def_mesh(brna);
02830     rna_def_mvert(brna);
02831     rna_def_mvert_group(brna);
02832     rna_def_medge(brna);
02833     rna_def_mface(brna);
02834     rna_def_mloop(brna);
02835     rna_def_mpolygon(brna);
02836     rna_def_mloopuv(brna);
02837     rna_def_mtface(brna);
02838     rna_def_mtexpoly(brna);
02839     rna_def_msticky(brna);
02840     rna_def_mcol(brna);
02841     rna_def_mloopcol(brna);
02842     rna_def_mproperties(brna);
02843 }
